casebody.data:
Robert S. Lindsley v. Fine and Salzberg, Inc. January 16, 1976. Record No. 741152.

Present, I’Anson, C.J., Carrico, Harrison, Cochran, Poff and Compton, JJ.

Aldine J. Coffman, Jr. (Penelope D. Coffman; Coffman & Coffman, on brief), for appellant. Howard 1. Legum (Fine, Fine, Legum ér Fine, on brief), for appellee.

Richmond
